rows.name:
The Uzushio is about 65 meters long,
making it the largest ship in Avaritia.

rows.label: tlk000030_msg0002
rows.name:
Ahâ€”
Avaritia itself is also a ship.

rows.label: tlk000030_msg0003
rows.name: The hull of Avaritia is 240 meters long.

rows.label: tlk000030_msg0004
rows.name:
And the Divine Beast pulling the ship is
about three times that size.
